Rule.Name: NoTrailingWhiteSpace
Rule.Context: No line should end with whitespace.
Rule.Description: Validates that source code lines always trim trailing whitespace.

Rule.Name: IndentUsingTabs
Rule.Context: Indentation should be done with tabs - not spaces.
Rule.Description: Validates that source code lines are indented using tabs.

Rule.Name: NoSpacesBeforeTabs
Rule.Context: No spaces can immediately precede a tab.
Rule.Description: Validates that whitespace never uses a tab after a space.

Rule.Name: OneTabIndent
Rule.Context: Too many additional tabs on this line. Tabs must not be used to align the start of a code line with some character in the line above it.
Rule.Description: Validates that source code lines use tabs exactly as far as the previous line and spaces after that for character alignment.
